steps: Just a few simple steps to open a shop, let's check it out!

store.title: Make basic settings for your store
store.content: Give your store a name, upload a unique logo, or use a custom domain.

page.title: Build a unique store
page.content: Design attractive styles for your store, customize store colors and page layouts.

product.title: Upload your first product
product.content: Add an item to your store to expand your sales.

payment.title: Select a checkout method for your store
payment.content: Add a few gold streams to your store and give consumers more ways to pay.

shipment.title: Choose your shipping method
shipment.content: Add a few logistics to your store and provide different kinds of shipping methods.

bill.unpaid: Remind you this month's bill, please complete the payment before 12:00 noon (GMT + 8), if the store will be closed if the store will be closed.
bill.fail: This month's bill is automatically detained, please restore before 12:00 noon (GMT + 8) at noon, if the store will be closed if the store will be closed.

numberOfReminderSentMonthly: Notification letter for the expiry of this month's shopping deposit
